DOC.brief_title: Safety Effectiveness Taking Choline Supplements During Pregnancy Improving Infant Brain Development
DOC.detailed_description: Choline essential nutrient find food , egg yolk , liver , meat . It important composition repair normal cellular membrane , normal brain function , normal cardiovascular function . Research suggest presence adequate amount choline pregnancy breastfeed help ensure healthy fetal brain development . Additionally , adequate prenatal choline level may long-lasting positive effect cognitive function , include memory . However , sufficient research do effect choline pregnant woman unborn baby . This study evaluate safety effectiveness take choline supplement pregnancy , whether take choline pregnancy effect infant development . Participants double-blind study randomly assign receive either placebo 900 mg choline daily throughout pregnancy , delivery . Babies begin receive either placebo choline daily time birth 3 month old . Participants attend baseline study visit include eligibility assessment , urine collection , measurement vital sign , dispense study medication , ultrasound . Subsequent study visit occur every 4 week throughout pregnancy 6 month postpartum . Vital sign take , urine sample collect , study medication give visit . Two blood sample take Weeks 32 36 gestation . Heel stick perform baby 4 12 week old . Follow-up visit hold every 6 month baby 18 month old .
